<pcfarrar@...> writes:

> Hi,
> Does anyone know who the seller is on eBay going by the handle 
> katana.jap It says he is from Kobe Japan.

> I was thinking of bidding on one of his items.

I have bought from him successfully. I have head of other people
receiving repro goods. It might be worthwhile on anything you go for, to
ask up front if it is a repro or not and get his response on file.

Well, in general, this is a good thing to do with any seller you don't
know yet. 

- darcy
